original: intros l1 l2 a H1 H2 H3. unfold ulist in H3. apply ulist_app with (a::nil). - intros x H4. apply in_ex_app in H4. destruct H4 as [l3 [l4 H4]]. destruct H4 as [H4 H5]. subst. apply in_split in H4. destruct H4 as [l5 [l6 H4]]. subst. apply ulist_sind. + apply ulist_nil. + intros b l7 H6 H7 H8. apply in_ex_app in H6. destruct H6 as [l8 [l9 H6]]. destruct H6 as [H6 H10]. subst. apply H8. apply in_split in H7. destruct H7 as [l11 [l12 H7]]. subst. apply app_inv_app in H9. destruct H9. * destruct H as [l13 H]. subst. contradiction. * destruct H as [l13 H]. destruct H. subst. apply H3 with b. -- apply in_app_iff. right. left. reflexivity. -- apply in_app_iff. left. auto. -- apply in_app_iff. right. left. reflexivity. + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply H1. - apply H2. - intros b H4 H5. apply in_app_iff in H4. destruct H4 as [H4 | [H4 | H4]]. + apply H3 with b. * apply in_or_app. left. auto. * apply in_or_app. left. auto. + subst. contradiction. + apply H3 with b. * apply in_or_app. right. auto. * apply in_or_app. right. auto.
